text: Eleanor Claire Reeves (born 11 December 1980) is a British politician who has served as Chairperson of the Labour Party and Minister of State without Portfolio since July 2024. As a member of the Labour Party, she has been the Member of Parliament for Lewisham West and East Dulwich, formerly Lewisham West and Penge, since 2017. She used to be Shadow Solicitor General for England and Wales from April of 2020 until December of 2021 and Shadow Minister for Prisons and Probation from 2021 until 2023. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:English lawyers Category:Living people Category:Politicians from London Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:UK MPs 2024–present
title: Ellie Reeves
